channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Cops Reloaded
channel.desc: Cops chase after an automobile that ran a stop sign, the suspect eventually hits another car and is arrested for driving without a license and drug possession; a female is arrested when marijuana and cocaine are found in her car.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Cops Reloaded
channel.desc: A man hits a pedestrian and runs but is caught, tasered, and faces many charges including resisting arrest, hit and run, and driving without a license; cops arrest a man for stealing a Porsche.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Cops Reloaded
channel.desc: Cops pull over a motorcyclist who refuses to stop at a traffic signal; cops respond to a fight that breaks out in a near by parking lot.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Cops Reloaded
channel.desc: Several armed men at a nearby home are arrested for assaulting people and attempting to run from cops; cops find a busted-in window of a car with a man in the front seat who claims its his car.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Cops Reloaded
channel.desc: Officers get a call about a man kicking out car windows; a male is arrested for attempting to steal a car at a strip mall.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Cops Reloaded
channel.desc: A man who is out on bond for grand theft auto is arrested again for trying to steal a car; two men are arrested for threatening a woman when she sees them beating up her neighbor.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Cops Reloaded
channel.desc: Cops chase a car that just left a known drug house, but when the suspect is pulled over, he is arrested for felony of evasion and tampering with evidence; a K-9 unit finds cocaine under the passenger seat of a car and three suspects are arrested.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: BodyCam by Law&Crime
channel.desc: Officers pull over a woman after multiple callers reported her erratic driving.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: BodyCam by Law&Crime
channel.desc: A woman gets arrested at a Florida Walmart after allegedly shoplifting various grocery items.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: BodyCam by Law&Crime
channel.desc: A suspected drunk driver is arrested after a traffic stop takes a dramatic turn.

channel.title: BodyCam by Law&Crime
channel.desc: Ohio man allegedly breaks into a womans home and proves monsters are real..

channel.desc: Mom gives worst excuse for drunk driving with her baby.

channel.title: BodyCam by Law&Crime
channel.desc: A navy sailor stationed in Key West gets arrested after he allegedly dropped his drawers at several bars.

channel.desc: Woman with expired license plate tags is "done paying taxes.".

channel.desc: Man offers to go toe-to-toe with five officers who confront him..

channel.title: BodyCam by Law&Crime
channel.desc: A Florida mother is arrested after allegedly attempting to sell her baby for $500.

channel.title: BodyCam by Law&Crime
channel.desc: Police arrests a woman for alleged assault; she reportedly bites, kicks and spits at officers.

channel.name: Law & Crime US

channel.desc: A drunk Karen unleashes a full-blown racist rant during a disturbing incident at the Holiday Inn.

channel.desc: An Ohio woman faces arrest after allegedly calling the police when Walmart staff asked her to exit the store.

channel.desc: Deputies respond to a call in a store after staff catches a woman peeling and swapping price tags of several items.

channel.desc: Ohio woman tased after allegedly ramming cop cars.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Sidebar
channel.desc: A daily recap podcast that highlights the top moments from the biggest trials of the day.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Cops Reloaded
channel.desc: "Cops" has been producing new episodes for more than 20 years, and with daily repeats of the iconic series entering their second decade on the air, producers felt it was time for a change to freshen things up, which is how the idea for "Cops Reloaded" was born. This entry in the long-running franchise takes footage from previous episodes and re-edits it to produce new episodes. Some of the program's wildest criminals, most memorable car chases, and craziest moments are featured on "Reloaded.".

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Jail
channel.desc: Jail gives viewers a front row seat as recently arrested suspects face entry into the criminal justice system.
